name: Shido [OLD]
description: Shido is a unique and powerful Cross-Chain Ecosystem with state of the art DeFi Utilities. It's a safe haven for investors with tokenomics that attracts serious investors. Our DeFi Utility and Protocols are fully audited and our professional team is doxxed. Liquidity pools are safely locked at Mudra and Team Finance for 5 years. It was our strategic plan that $SHIDO would first appear on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) through a small and quite Fair Launch. Then grow organically and establish ourselves on a strong foundation. We are now launched on the Ethereum Network (ETH), along with our ETH-bridge connecting the networks together. Shido's expansion to new networks opens up the possibility for new investors to enter. It also readies our way for a Cross-Chain Ecosystem which our DeFi Utilities are built upon. Shido is official partner to Antier Solutions, Top 30 Blockchain Development Company in the world. We are together building Shido Dex Multi-Chain DeFi Aggregator, Shido Wallet Fiat Compatible, ShidoDex+ Perpetual Trading & Lending, Shido Games P2E Gaming Platform & Shido Market NFT Marketplace. $SHIDO is the utility token and governance token in all our DeFi Utilities.
